sentences.en: Elton teamed up with Eric Clapton to wow thousands at a Wembley rock concert.
sentences.cn: 埃尔顿和埃里克·克拉普顿在温布利举行的一场摇滚音乐会上联袂演出，征服了数千位听众。

sentences.en: Hey wow, man! Where d'you get those boots?
sentences.cn: 哎哟，老弟，哪里搞来的靴子？

sentences.en: I thought, "Wow, what a good idea".
If you want to sell your house quickly, it needs a wow factor.
sentences.cn: 若想很快把房子卖掉，就得找个卖点。

sentences.en: It was hard to watch friends, or to watch people who I admired, up there performing and think to myself, 'Wow, I only know that now from here — from standing in the audience.
sentences.cn: 斯泰普说，“看到朋友或是我崇拜的人在台上演出，想到‘哇，我对他们现在的了解的只是从现在，从站在听众里的这一刻开始。’ 这是自己很难接受的。”

sentences.en: Wow ! That car certainly goes fast ! !
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车开得可真叫快!

sentences.en: Wow ! Well , then I have to say, you're a real go - getter!
sentences.cn: 喔! 我得说你是个不折不扣埋头苦干的人!

sentences.en: Wow, I'm going back to college.
Wow, that's cool! What time do you want to meet?
sentences.cn: 哇, 太酷了! 你想几点钟见面?
哇, 你还穿着白色的靴子!
哇！ 我们能试试它么？

sentences.en: Wow! Come and feast your eyes on this birthday cake!
sentences.cn: 哇! 快来欣赏一下这个生日蛋糕!

sentences.en: Wow! Is it made in Shanghai?
sentences.cn: 好哇! 是上海制造的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Wow! She is really well - built!
Wow! This scenery really knocks me out.
sentences.cn: 哇! 这儿的景色简直把我迷住了.

trans.tran_en: used when you think something is very impressive or surprising

trans.tran_cn: 一鸣惊人，音符失真，声音走音，魔兽世界（游戏）
<俚>使惊叹，使佩服，使热烈叫好
